statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control;
SELECT product_name, current_specifications FROM quality_control;
SELECT id, product_name, historical_data FROM quality_control;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, historical_data FROM quality_control WHERE product_name = 'Widget';
SELECT * FROM quality_control ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, product_name FROM quality_control WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE 'B%' AND id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT id, product_name, current_specifications FROM quality_control WHERE LENGTH(current_specifications) > 100 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, product_name, historical_data FROM quality_control WHERE LENGTH(historical_data) > 500 AND id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_specification FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_id = 101
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date_added > '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM current_product_specifications ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) as total FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, product_specification FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_name DESC

SELECT product_id, product_name, historical_specification, date_added FROM current_product_specifications INNER JOIN historical_data ON current_product_specifications.product_id = historical_data.product_id

SELECT product_id, product_name, historical_specification FROM current_product_specifications LEFT JOIN historical_data ON current_product_specifications.product_id = historical_data.product_id WHERE historical_specification IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, dimensions, weight FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM QualityControl WHERE control_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY control_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, dimensions FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT product_id, control_result, control_date FROM QualityControl ORDER BY control_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, recorded_date FROM HistoricalData WHERE dimensions LIKE '%x%';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE weight > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE recorded_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY recorded_date DESC
SELECT product_id, dimensions FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE weight < 5 AND dimensions IS NOT NULL
SELECT product_id, control_result FROM QualityControl WHERE control_result = 'pass' AND control_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE dimensions LIKE '%x%'
SELECT * FROM current_product_specifications;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_size FROM current_product_specifications ORDER BY product_size DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data_id, date, quantity, quality_score FROM historical_data WHERE quality_score > 90 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM current_product_specifications
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM current_product_specifications WHERE product_type='Electronics'
SELECT data_id, product_id, date, quantity FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM quality_control_team WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_name ASC
SELECT cr.result_id, cr.deviation_score, cps.product_name FROM comparison_results cr JOIN current_product_specifications cps ON cr.product_id = cps.product_id
SELECT * FROM ProductSpecifications ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, spec_type FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE spec_type = 'Technical';
SELECT product_name, spec_details->>'weight' AS weight FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE spec_details->>'color' = 'blue';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_location FROM QualityControlTeams WHERE team_location = 'Factory A' ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT product_id, measurement_date, measurement_value FROM CurrentProductSpecs WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductSpecifications WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, spec_type FROM ProductSpecifications ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalData WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM QualityControlTeams WHERE team_location = 'Factory A';
SELECT product_id, measurement_date, measurement_value FROM CurrentProductSpecs WHERE inspector_id = 1001;
